entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
